meanings.definition: A type of car with a rear door that opens upwards.
meanings.sent1: My friend drives one of those hatchbacks to school every day.
meanings.sent2: Hatchbacks are popular for their convenient rear door design.
meanings.sent3: Why did the chicken choose a hatchback as its vehicle?
meanings.sent4: The hatchbacks in the parking lot looked like colorful beetles ready to take off.
meanings.sent5: The family road trip was unforgettable thanks to the spacious hatchback.

meanings.definition: The act of opening the rear door of a car.
meanings.sent1: I helped with the hatchback when we were unloading groceries.
meanings.sent2: Be careful with the hatchback, it can hit your head if you're not paying attention.
meanings.sent3: The magician's trick involved a disappearing hatchback door!
meanings.sent4: As the hatchback swung open, it revealed a surprise gift inside.
meanings.sent5: The hatchback's squeaky hinge always gave away when someone was coming.
